<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Returns a reference to a group of FMA3 opcodes to where the given</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p Opcode is included. If the given \\p Opcode is not recognized as FMA3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and not included into any FMA3 group, then nullptr is returned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6ac81c73fb91e0b2c0c30ae63c671d23"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/x86instrfma3group">X86InstrFMA3Group</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6ac81c73fb91e0b2c0c30ae63c671d23">llvm::getFMA3Group</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opcode, uint64&#95;t TSFlags) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FMA3 instructions have a well defined encoding pattern we can exploit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t BaseOpcode = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86ii/#ac5e00b79e046b7edec72a31f9398ea75">X86II::getBaseOpcodeFor</a>(TSFlags);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsFMA3Opcode = ((BaseOpcode &gt;= 150 &amp;&amp; BaseOpcode &lt;= 0x9F) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       (BaseOpcode &gt;= 166 &amp;&amp; BaseOpcode &lt;= 0xAF) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       (BaseOpcode &gt;= 182 &amp;&amp; BaseOpcode &lt;= 0xBF));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsFMA3Encoding = ((TSFlags &amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86ii/#a74027296f130de8cbbe7bc543dc4285ead5bbb0f8b7dfd268d7ca01219b5ec3aa">X86II::EncodingMask</a>) == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86ii/#a74027296f130de8cbbe7bc543dc4285ea6702853ec24d45d810d71e321eb9e256">X86II::VEX</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         (TSFlags &amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86ii/#a74027296f130de8cbbe7bc543dc4285ea17bada293123ac2f889d0dece275027d">X86II::OpMapMask</a>) == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86ii/#a74027296f130de8cbbe7bc543dc4285eaa77319fb93896ec55033cdf328e8771d">X86II::T8</a>) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        ((TSFlags &amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86ii/#a74027296f130de8cbbe7bc543dc4285ead5bbb0f8b7dfd268d7ca01219b5ec3aa">X86II::EncodingMask</a>) == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86ii/#a74027296f130de8cbbe7bc543dc4285ea1224cf85d21a6023de72b90c2f225241">X86II::EVEX</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         ((TSFlags &amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86ii/#a74027296f130de8cbbe7bc543dc4285ea17bada293123ac2f889d0dece275027d">X86II::OpMapMask</a>) == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86ii/#a74027296f130de8cbbe7bc543dc4285eaa77319fb93896ec55033cdf328e8771d">X86II::T8</a> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          (TSFlags &amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86ii/#a74027296f130de8cbbe7bc543dc4285ea17bada293123ac2f889d0dece275027d">X86II::OpMapMask</a>) == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86ii/#a74027296f130de8cbbe7bc543dc4285eada4e10341f02b847bf34cb85ddd0752a">X86II::T&#95;MAP6</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsFMA3Prefix = (TSFlags &amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86ii/#a74027296f130de8cbbe7bc543dc4285eafd3ef015d11de7b9cf6d25507774a0a9">X86II::OpPrefixMask</a>) == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86ii/#a74027296f130de8cbbe7bc543dc4285ea8d230b4df405685c7dc1f1db718d7008">X86II::PD</a> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      (TSFlags &amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86ii/#a74027296f130de8cbbe7bc543dc4285eafd3ef015d11de7b9cf6d25507774a0a9">X86II::OpPrefixMask</a>) == 0; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// X86II::PS</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!IsFMA3Opcode || !IsFMA3Encoding || !IsFMA3Prefix)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"></CodeLine>
